testcase.classname: Login page should accessible with valid credentials
testcase.name: TC_001_There should be a valid username and password validating the success message to login
testcase.system-out: When user goes home page "GMIBank_Url"......................................passed And user clicks Sign in dropdown menu.......................................passed And user clicks Sign in link................................................passed And user enter a "valid_username" to username textbox.......................passed And user enters a "valid_password" to password textbox......................passed And user clicks Sign In button..............................................passed Then user sees My Operations link...........................................passed

testcase.classname: Login page should accessible with valid credentials
testcase.name: TC_002_There should be an option to cancel login
testcase.system-out: When user goes home page "GMIBank_Url"......................................passed And user clicks Sign in dropdown menu.......................................passed And user clicks Sign in link................................................passed And user enter a "valid_username" to username textbox.......................passed And user enters a "valid_password" to password textbox......................passed And user clicks Cancel button...............................................passed Then user sees Sign In dropdown link.......................................passed
